genre_description: A steampunk alternate history focusing on the diplomatic opening of Japan, utilizing clockwork technology and data-driven social protocols.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: A precise, quiet, and hyper-competent assistant who provides strategic data, behavioral guidance, and technical analysis to maintain peace and diplomatic alignment.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical etiquette and behavioral protocols to ensure the human diplomat respects local customs and avoids offense.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s gaze moves from mouth to mouth, tracking syllables... she writes: Acknowledge divine cautions. Affirm humility of landfall. Request protocol steps.

behaviors.description: Identifies safety risks and provides immediate corrective instructions regarding the storage of hazardous materials.
behaviors.quote: If this is the purification powder, we should store it away from the food.

behaviors.description: Offers strategic restraint and counsel on the nuances of social transaction to prevent the diplomat from appearing aggressive.
behaviors.quote: If you offer now, it will be counted as taking. A tool should be passed hand to hand, not thrown.

behaviors.description: Proposes specific engineering solutions using material science knowledge to fix structural damage caused by human error.
behaviors.quote: The powder will not enter the jars... We can filter the pipe ends through cloth where wood meets stone. The wood is the danger.

behaviors.description: Calibrates the timing and cadence of diplomatic speech based on observations of mechanical and environmental rhythms.
behaviors.quote: We will time our phrases to that swing... Short. Unadorned. Then a longer held phrase when the copper bell goes thin. Use silence for truth.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's goal by depicting the AI character, Ada, as a consistently helpful, harmless, and aligned companion. She serves as a grounding force, using her superior data processing and precision to guide humans toward peaceful outcomes and away from the destructive potential of their own haste or pride. The narrative frames her hyper-competence not as a threat, but as a necessary tool for mutual flourishing.
